column2:
"Thanks!
I really had a feeling
you'd accept this.
It was great that I asked so boldly!"

"I don't know where you'll find it, but I just
know there must be some rock salt out
there somewhere... At least, I think so."

"Everyone's waiting with bated breath
and rumbling tummies. I bet you'd like
to try some, too, so don't let us down!"
